Both rules apply to QPushButton instances (since QPushButton inherits QAbstractButton) and there is a conflict for the color property. Because QPushButton inherits QAbstractButton, it might be tempting to assume that QPushButton is more specific than QAbstractButton. However, for style sheet computations, all Type Selectors have the same specificity, and the rule that appears last takes precedence. In other words, color is set to gray for all QAbstractButtons, including QPushButtons. If we really want QPushButtons to have red text, we can always reorder the rules.
trans-unit.target: 这两个规则都适用于QPushButton实例（因为QPushButton继承了QAbstractButton），并且color属性存在冲突。由于QPushButton继承了QAbstractButton，因此很可能会认为 QPushButton 比 QAbstractButton 更具体。但是，对于样式表计算，所有类型选择器都具有相同的特异性，并且最后出现的规则优先。换句话说，所有QAbstractButton（包括QPushButton）的颜色都设置为 gray 。如果我们真的想要QPushButton如果要显示红色文字，我们可以随时对规则进行重新排序。

trans-unit.source: Both rules apply to QPushButton instances (since QPushButton inherits QAbstractButton) and there is a conflict for the color property. Because QPushButton inherits QAbstractButton, it might be tempting to assume that QPushButton is more specific than QAbstractButton. However, for style sheet computations, all Type Selectors have the same specificity, and the rule that appears last takes precedence. In other words, color is set to gray for all QAbstractButtons, including QPushButtons. If we really want QPushButtons to have red text, we can always reorder the rules.

trans-unit.source: Both syntaxes work with all database drivers provided by Qt. If the database supports the syntax natively, Qt simply forwards the query to the DBMS; otherwise, Qt simulates the placeholder syntax by preprocessing the query. The actual query that ends up being executed by the DBMS is available as QSqlQuery::executedQuery().
trans-unit.target: 这两种语法都可以与Qt提供的所有数据库驱动程序一起使用。如果数据库本身支持语法，则Qt会将查询转发到DBMS；否则，Qt会将查询转发到DBMS。否则，Qt通过预处理查询来模拟占位符语法。最终由DBMS执行的实际查询可作为QSqlQuery :: executedQuery（）获得。

trans-unit.source: Buffering is turned on when bufferSize is greater than 1. The sensor will collect the requested number of samples and deliver them all to the application at one time. They will be delivered to the application as a burst of changed readings so it is particularly important that the application processes each reading immediately or saves the values somewhere else.
trans-unit.target: 当缓冲区大小大于1时,缓冲区将被打开。 传感器将收集所要求的样本数量,并一次性将它们全部传递给应用程序。它们将以一连串变化的读数传递给应用程序,因此应用程序立即处理每个读数或将值保存在其他地方是特别重要的。

Building Qt for a given device requires a toolchain and a sysroot. Additionally, some devices require vendor-specific adaptation code for EGL and OpenGL ES 2.0 support. This is not relevant for non-accelerated platforms, such as those that use the LinuxFB plugin, which is meant for software-based rendering only.
trans-unit.target: 为给定设备构建Qt需要工具链和 sysroot 。此外，某些设备需要特定于供应商的适应代码才能支持EGL和OpenGL ES 2.0。这与非加速平台（例如使用LinuxFB插件的平台）无关，后者仅用于基于软件的渲染。

trans-unit.source: Building Qt for a given device requires a toolchain and a sysroot. Additionally, some devices require vendor specific adaptation code for EGL and OpenGL ES 2.0 support. This is not relevant for non-accelerated platforms, for example the ones using the VxWorksFB plugin, however neither OpenGL nor Qt Quick 2 will be functional in such a setup.
trans-unit.target: 为给定设备构建Qt需要工具链和sysroot。此外，某些设备要求供应商特定的适应代码才能支持EGL和OpenGL ES 2.0。这与非加速平台无关，例如使用VxWorksFB插件的平台，但是OpenGL和Qt Quick 2在这种设置下均不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Building Qt for a given device requires a toolchain and a sysroot. Additionally, some devices require vendor specific adaptation code for EGL and OpenGL ES 2.0 support. Building on top of QGraphicsItem's capabilities and lean footprint, QGraphicsWidget provides the best of both worlds: extra functionality from QWidget, such as the style, font, palette, layout direction, and its geometry, and resolution independence and transformation support from QGraphicsItem. Because Graphics View uses real coordinates instead of integers, QGraphicsWidget's geometry functions also operate on QRectF and QPointF. This also applies to frame rects, margins and spacing. With QGraphicsWidget it's not uncommon to specify contents margins of (0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5), for example. You can create both subwidgets and "top-level" windows; in some cases you can now use Graphics View for advanced MDI applications.
trans-unit.target: 基于QGraphicsItem的功能和精简版图，QGraphicsWidget提供了两全其美的功能：QWidget的其他功能，例如样式，字体，调色板，布局方向及其几何形状，以及QGraphicsItem的分辨率独立性和转换支持。由于Graphics View使用实数坐标而不是整数，因此QGraphicsWidget的几何函数也可以在QRectF和QPointF上运行。这也适用于框架矩形，边距和间距。使用QGraphicsWidget例如，通常指定（0.5、0.5、0.5、0.5）的内容边距。您可以创建子小部件和“顶层”窗口。在某些情况下，您现在可以将Graphics View用于高级MDI应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Building on top of QGraphicsItem's capabilities and lean footprint, QGraphicsWidget provides the best of both worlds: extra functionality from QWidget, such as the style, font, palette, layout direction, and its geometry, and resolution independence and transformation support from QGraphicsItem. Because Graphics View uses real coordinates instead of integers, QGraphicsWidget's geometry functions also operate on QRectF and QPointF. This also applies to frame rects, margins and spacing. With QGraphicsWidget it's not uncommon to specify contents margins of (0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5), for example. You can create both subwidgets and "top-level" windows; in some cases you can now use Graphics View for advanced MDI applications.

Building on top of QGraphicsItem's capabilities and lean footprint, QGraphicsWidget provides the best of both worlds: extra functionality from QWidget, such as the style, font, palette, layout direction, and its geometry, and resolution independence and transformation support from QGraphicsItem. Because Graphics View uses real coordinates instead of integers, QGraphicsWidget's geometry functions also operate on QRectF and QPointF. This also applies to frame rects, margins and spacing. trans-unit.source: But it's not always so simple. The Spanish version of a printer dialog with settings for two-sided printing and binding would probably require both "Activado" and "Activada" as translations for "Enabled". In this case the source text would be "Enabled" in both cases, and the context would be the dialog's class name, but the two items would have disambiguations such as "two-sided printing" for one and "binding" for the other. The disambiguation enables the translator to choose the appropriate gender for the Spanish version, and enables Qt to distinguish between translations.
trans-unit.target: 但这并不总是那么简单。西班牙文版的打印机对话框,如果设置双面打印和装订,可能需要 "Activado "和 "Activada "作为 "Enabled "的翻译。在这种情况下,源文本在两种情况下都是 "Enabled",上下文是对话框的类名,但这两个项目将有歧义,例如一个是 "双面打印",另一个是 "装订"。歧义使译者能够为西班牙语版本选择合适的性别,并使Qt能够区分不同的翻译。

trans-unit.source: By connecting to the QQuickWindow::beforeRendering() and QQuickWindow::afterRendering() signals, applications can make OpenGL calls directly into the same context as the scene graph is rendering to. As the signal names indicate, the user can then render OpenGL content either under a Qt Quick scene or over it. The benefit of integrating in this manner is that no extra framebuffer nor memory is needed to perform the rendering. The downside is that Qt Quick decides when to call the signals and this is the only time the OpenGL application is allowed to draw.
trans-unit.target: 通过连接到QQuickWindow :: beforeRendering（）和QQuickWindow :: afterRendering（）信号，应用程序可以在场景图渲染到的同一上下文中直接进行OpenGL调用。如信号名称所示，用户随后可以在Qt Quick场景下或上方渲染OpenGL内容。以这种方式集成的好处是不需要额外的帧缓冲区或内存来执行渲染。缺点是Qt Quick决定何时调用信号，这是唯一允许OpenGL应用程序绘制的时间。

trans-unit.source: By connecting to the QQuickWindow::beforeRendering() and QQuickWindow::afterRendering() signals, applications can make OpenGL calls directly into the same context as the scene graph is rendering to. With APIs like Vulkan or Metal, applications can query native objects, such as, the scene graph's command buffer, via QSGRendererInterface, and record commands to it as they see fit. As the signal names indicate, the user can then render content either under a Qt Quick scene or over it. The benefit of integrating in this manner is that no extra framebuffer nor memory is needed to perform the rendering, and a possibly expensive texturing step is eliminated. The downside is that Qt Quick decides when to call the signals and this is the only time the OpenGL application is allowed to draw.

trans-unit.source: By default a minimal service discovery is performed. In this mode, the returned QBluetoothServiceInfo objects are guaranteed to contain only device and service UUID information. Depending on platform and device capabilities, other service information may also be available. The minimal service discovery mode relies on cached SDP data of the platform. Therefore it is possible that this discovery does not find a device although it is physically available. In such cases a full discovery must be performed to force an update of the platform cache. However for most use cases a minimal discovery is adequate as it is much quicker and other classes which require up-to-date information such as QBluetoothSocket::connectToService() will perform additional discovery if required. If the full service information is required, pass FullDiscovery as the discoveryMode parameter to start().
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，执行最少的服务发现。在这种模式下，保证返回的QBluetoothServiceInfo对象仅包含设备和服务UUID信息。根据平台和设备的功能，其他服务信息也可能可用。最小服务发现模式依赖于平台的缓存SDP数据。因此，尽管此发现在物理上可用，但可能找不到该设备。在这种情况下，必须执行完全发现以强制更新平台缓存。但是，对于大多数用例来说，只需进行最少的发现就可以了，因为它的查找要快得多，并且其他类需要最新的信息，例如QBluetoothSocket :: connectToService（）将在需要时执行其他发现。如果需要完整的服务信息，则将FullDiscovery作为DiscoveryMode参数传递给start（）。

trans-unit.source: By default the Effect cannot count on textures preserving their contents between frames. When a new intermediate texture is created, it is cleared to vec4(0.0). Afterwards, the same texture can be reused for another purpose. Therefore, effect passes should always write to the entire texture, without making assumptions about their content at the start of the pass. There is an exception to this: Buffer objects with bufferFlags set to Buffer.SceneLifetime. This indicates that the texture is permanently associated with a pass of the effect and it will not be reused for other purposes. The contents of such color buffers is preserved between frames. This is typically used in a ping-pong fashion in effects like motion blur: the first pass takes the persistent buffer as its input, in addition to the effects main input texture, outputting to another intermediate buffer, while the second pass outputs to the persistent buffer. This way in the first frame the first pass samples an empty (transparent) texture, whereas in subsequent frames it samples the output of the second pass from the previous frame. A third pass can then blend the effect's input and the second pass' output together.

By default the SVG rendering is cached using QGraphicsItem::DeviceCoordinateCache mode to speedup the display of items. Caching can be disabled by passing QGraphicsItem::NoCache to the QGraphicsItem::setCacheMode() method.

By default the backend will automatically choose the correct EGL layer for the default plane of each output. When necessary, this can be overridden by setting the QT_QPA_EGLFS_LAYER_INDEX environment variable to the index of the desired layer. This approach does not currently support multiple outputs, so its usage should be limited to systems with a single screen. To see which layers are available, and to debug potential startup issues, enable the logging category qt.qpa.eglfs.kms.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，后端将自动为每个输出的默认平面选择正确的EGL层。如有必要，可以通过将 QT_QPA_EGLFS_LAYER_INDEX 环境变量设置为所需图层的索引来覆盖此设置。该方法当前不支持多个输出，因此应仅将其用于具有单个屏幕的系统。要查看可用的层并调试潜在的启动问题，请启用日志记录类别 qt.qpa.eglfs.kms 。

trans-unit.source: By default the timeline runs once, from its beginning to its end, upon which you must call start() again to restart from the beginning. To make the timeline loop, you can call setLoopCount(), passing the number of times the timeline should run before finishing. The direction can also be changed, causing the timeline to run backward, by calling setDirection(). You can also pause and unpause the timeline while it's running by calling setPaused(). For interactive control, the setCurrentTime() function is provided, which sets the time position of the time line directly. Although most useful in NotRunning state (e.g., connected to a valueChanged() signal in a QSlider), this function can be called at any time.

By default the timeline runs once, from the beginning and towards the end, upon which you must call start() again to restart from the beginning. To make the timeline loop, you can call setLoopCount(), passing the number of times the timeline should run before finishing. The direction can also be changed, causing the timeline to run backward, by calling setDirection(). You can also pause and unpause the timeline while it's running by calling setPaused(). For interactive control, the setCurrentTime() function is provided, which sets the time position of the time line directly. Although most useful in NotRunning state, (e.g., connected to a valueChanged() signal in a QSlider,) this function can be called at any time.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，时间轴从头到尾运行一次，然后必须再次调用start（）从头开始。要使时间线循环，您可以调用setLoopCount（），传递时间线在完成之前应运行的次数。也可以通过调用setDirection（）来更改方向，从而使时间轴向后运行。您还可以通过调用setPaused（）在时间轴运行时暂停和取消暂停它。对于交互式控制，提供了setCurrentTime（）函数，该函数直接设置时间线的时间位置。尽管在NotRunning状态下最有用（例如，连接到valueChanged（）QSlider中的（）信号）可以随时调用此函数。

trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，QUrl setter方法在QUrl :: TolerantMode中运行，这意味着它们接受一些常见的错误和数据的错误表示。解析的另一种方法是QUrl :: StrictMode，它将应用进一步的检查。有关解析模式差异的说明，请参见QUrl :: ParsingMode。

trans-unit.source: By default, QUrlQuery uses an equal sign ("=") to separate a key from its value, and an ampersand ("&") to separate key-value pairs from each other. It is possible to change the delimiters that QUrlQuery uses for parsing and for reconstructing the query by calling setQueryDelimiters().
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，QUrlQuery使用等号（“ =”）将键与其值分开，并使用＆号（“＆”）将键值对彼此分开。可以通过调用setQueryDelimiters（）来更改QUrlQuery用于解析和重建查询的定界符。

trans-unit.source: By default, QWizard uses the AeroStyle on a Windows Vista system with alpha compositing enabled, regardless of the current widget style. If this is not the case, the default wizard style depends on the current widget style as follows: MacStyle is the default if the current widget style is QMacStyle, ModernStyle is the default if the current widget style is QWindowsStyle, and ClassicStyle is the default in all other cases.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，QWizard使用AeroStyle在Windows Vista系统上的α合成启用，而当前控件的风格。如果不是这种情况下，默认的向导风格依赖于当前控件样式如下：MacStyle是默认的，如果当前控件样式QMacStyle，ModernStyle是默认的，如果当前控件风格QWindowsStyle，并ClassicStyle是默认所有其他情况。

trans-unit.source: By default, QXmlStreamWriter encodes XML in UTF-8. Different encodings can be enforced using setCodec().
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，QXmlStreamWriter以UTF-8编码XML。可以使用setCodec（）实施不同的编码。

trans-unit.source: By default, QT contains core and gui, ensuring that standard GUI applications can be built without further configuration.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， QT 包含 core 和 gui ，确保无需进一步配置即可构建标准GUI应用程序。

trans-unit.source: By default, loops is 1: the animation will play through once and then stop.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， loops 为1：动画将播放一次，然后停止。

trans-unit.source: By default, main.qml will use CustomButton.qml for the CustomButton type. However, when the application is run with the Material style, the Material selector will be present and the +Material/CustomButton.qml version will be used instead.

trans-unit.target: 默认情况下为 true 。

trans-unit.source: By default, HTTPS pages cannot run JavaScript, CSS, plugins or web-sockets from HTTP URLs. This provides an override to get the old insecure behavior. Disabled by default. (Added in Qt 5.8)
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,HTTPS页面不能从HTTP URL中运行JavaScript、CSS、插件或web-sockets。这提供了一个覆盖来获得旧的不安全行为。默认情况下是禁用的。(在Qt 5.8中添加)

trans-unit.source: By default, HTTPS pages cannot run JavaScript, CSS, plugins or web-sockets from HTTP URLs. This used to be possible and this provides an override to get the old behavior.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,HTTPS页面不能从HTTP URL中运行JavaScript、CSS、插件或web-sockets。这在过去是可能的,这提供了一个覆盖以获得旧的行为。

trans-unit.source: By default, JavaScript files imported from QML share their context with the QML component. That means the JavaScript files have access to the same QML objects and can modify them. As a consequence, each import must have a unique copy of these files.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,从QML导入的JavaScript文件与QML组件共享其上下文。这意味着JavaScript文件可以访问相同的QML对象,并可以修改它们。因此,每次导入都必须拥有这些文件的唯一副本。

trans-unit.source: By default, KeyNavigation receives key events after the item to which it is attached. If the item accepts the key event, the KeyNavigation attached property will not receive an event for that key. Setting the priority property to KeyNavigation.BeforeItem allows the event to be used for key navigation before the item, rather than after.

By default, MouseArea items only report mouse clicks and not changes to the position of the mouse cursor. Setting the hoverEnabled property ensures that handlers defined for onPositionChanged, onEntered and onExited are used and that the containsMouse property is updated even when no mouse buttons are pressed.

By default, OpenGL supports up to 8 additional clipping planes. ClipPlane allows to enable one of these additional planes. These planes can then be manipulated in the shaders using gl_ClipDistance[i] where i varies between 0 and 7. The underlying implementation may support more than 8 clip planes, but it is not guaranteed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，OpenGL支持多达8个附加的剪切平面。ClipPlane允许启用这些附加平面之一。然后可以使用gl_ClipDistance [i]在着色器中操纵这些平面，其中i在0到7之间变化。基础实现可能支持8个以上的剪切平面，但不能保证。

trans-unit.source: By default, OpenGL supports up to 8 additional clipping planes. ClipPlane allows to enable one of these additional planes. These planes can then be manipulated in the shaders using gl_ClipDistance[i] where i varies between 0 and 7. The underlying implementation may support more than 8 clip planes, but it is not guaranteed.

By default, OpenGL supports up to 8 additional clipping planes. Qt3DCore::QClipPlane allows to enable one of these additional planes. These planes can then be manipulated in the shaders using gl_ClipDistance[i] where i varies between 0 and 7. The underlying implementation may support more than 8 clip planes, but it is not guaranteed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,OpenGL 支持多达 8 个额外的剪接平面。Qt3DCore::QClipPlane 允许启用其中一个额外的平面,然后在着色器中使用 gl_ClipDistance[i]对这些平面进行操作,其中 i 在 0 和 7 之间变化。这些平面可以在着色器中使用gl_ClipDistance[i]进行操作,其中i在0和7之间变化。底层实现可能支持超过8个夹子平面,但这并不保证。

trans-unit.source: By default, OpenGL writes scene depth information into the depth buffer in the range [0.0, 1.0] corresponding to the near and far clip planes. QDepthRange allows mapping these values into a different range. For example setting the range [0.0, 0.5] will map the rendered scene into the depth buffer such that objects at the near clip plane have depth value of 0.0 and objects at the far clip plane have a depth value of 0.5. This allows rendering parts of the scene always in front of or behind other parts.

By default, OpenGL writes scene depth information into the depth buffer in the range [0.0, 1.0] with 0.0 corresponding to the near clip plane and 1.0 to the far clip plane. QDepthRange allows mapping these values into a different range so parts of the scene are always rendered in front of or behind other parts. Valid values for near and far are between 0 and 1.

By default, QDoc looks for //! as a code snippet marker. For .pro, .py, .cmake, and CMakeLists.txt files, #! is detected. Finally, <!-- is accepted in .html, .qrc, .ui, .xml, and .xq files.

By default, QGraphicsView provides a regular QWidget for the viewport widget. You can access this widget by calling viewport(), or you can replace it by calling setViewport(). To render using OpenGL, simply call setViewport(new QOpenGLWidget). QGraphicsView takes ownership of the viewport widget.

By default, QGraphicsView provides a regular QWidget for the viewport widget. You can access this widget by calling viewport(), or you can replace it by calling setViewport(). To render using OpenGL, simply call setViewport(new QOpenGLWidget). QGraphicsView takes ownership of the viewport widget.

trans-unit.source: By default, QSctpSocket operates in datagram mode. Before connecting, call setMaximumChannelCount() to set the maximum number of channels that the application is prepared to support. This number is a parameter negotiated with the remote endpoint and its value can be bounded by the operating system. The default value of 0 indicates to use the peer's value. If both endpoints have default values, then number of connection channels is system-dependent. After establishing a connection, you can fetch the actual number of channels by calling readChannelCount() and writeChannelCount().

By default, QUrl setter methods operate in QUrl::TolerantMode, which means they accept some common mistakes and mis-representation of data. An alternate method of parsing is QUrl::StrictMode, which applies further checks. See QUrl::ParsingMode for a description of the difference of the parsing modes.

By default, QUrlQuery uses an equal sign ("=") to separate a key from its value, and an ampersand ("&") to separate key-value pairs from each other. It is possible to change the delimiters that QUrlQuery uses for parsing and for reconstructing the query by calling setQueryDelimiters().
By default, QXmlStreamWriter encodes XML in UTF-8. Different encodings can be enforced using setCodec().
By default, Qt WebEngine uses Chromium settings, as described in Autoplay Policy Changes. To overwrite the default behavior, this property must be set to false.

By default, Qt Style Sheets disable regular QWidget palette and font propagation. When this flag is enabled, font and palette changes propagate as though the user had manually called the corresponding QWidget methods. See The Style Sheet Syntax - Inheritance for more details. This value was added in Qt 5.7.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Qt样式表禁用常规的QWidget调色板和字体传播。启用此标志后，字体和调色板更改会传播，就像用户手动调用了相应的QWidget方法一样。有关更多详细信息，请参见样式表语法-继承。这个值是在Qt 5.7中添加的。

trans-unit.source: By default, Qt creates a native Quit menu item that will react to the CMD+Q shortcut. Creating a QAction for the QAction::QuitRole role will replace that menu item. Therefore, the replacement action should be connected to either the QCoreApplication::quit slot, or a custom slot that stops the application.

trans-unit.source: By default, Qt will try to use the desktop settings. To prevent this, call setDesktopSettingsAware(false).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Qt将尝试使用桌面设置。为防止这种情况，请调用setDesktopSettingsAware（false）。

trans-unit.source: By default, Qt will try to use the platform specific desktop settings for each effect. Use the QApplication::setDesktopSettingsAware() function (passing false as argument) to prevent this, and the QApplication::setEffectEnabled() to enable or disable a particular effect.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Qt将尝试为每种效果使用平台特定的桌面设置。使用QApplication :: setDesktopSettingsAware（）函数（将 false 作为参数传递）可以防止这种情况，并使用QApplication :: setEffectEnabled（）可以启用或禁用特定效果。

trans-unit.source: By default, SpinBox provides discrete values in the range of [0-99] with a stepSize of 1.

By default, SslOptionDisableEmptyFragments is turned on since this causes problems with a large number of servers. SslOptionDisableLegacyRenegotiation is also turned on, since it introduces a security risk. SslOptionDisableCompression is turned on to prevent the attack publicised by CRIME. SslOptionDisableSessionPersistence is turned on to optimize memory usage. The other options are turned off.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,SslOptionDisableEmptyFragments是开启的,因为这会导致大量服务器出现问题。SslOptionDisableLegacyRenegotiation也被打开,因为它会带来安全风险。SslOptionDisableCompression被打开,以防止CRIME公开的攻击。SslOptionDisableSessionPersistence被打开以优化内存使用。其他选项是关闭的。

trans-unit.source: By default, TabBar resizes its buttons to fit the width of the control. The available space is distributed equally to each button. The default resizing behavior can be overridden by setting an explicit width for the buttons.

trans-unit.source: By default, a latitude of the coordinate is animated in the direction of shortest (geodesic) distance between those coordinates. Since CoordinateAnimation uses Mercator map projection, the latitude animation is always between -90 and 90 degrees. The longitude animation path is not limited and can go over 180 degrees in both west and east directions.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，会在这些坐标之间最短（大地）距离的方向上为坐标的纬度设置动画。由于CoordinateAnimation使用Mercator地图投影，因此纬度动画始终在-90到90度之间。该经度动画路径没有限制，可以去180度这两个西部和东部的方向。

trans-unit.source: By default, a latitude of the coordinate is animated in the direction of shortest (geodesic) distance between those coordinates. Since CoordinateAnimation uses Mercator map projection, the latitude animation is always between -90 and 90 degrees. The longitude animation path is not limited and can go over 180 degrees in both west and east directions.
By default, a GridView flows from left to right, and items are laid out from left to right horizontally, and from top to bottom vertically.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，GridView从左到右流动，并且项目从左到右水平放置，从上到下垂直放置。

trans-unit.source: By default, a QObject lives in the thread in which it is created. An object's thread affinity can be queried using thread() and changed using moveToThread().

By default, a QObject lives in the thread in which it is created. An object's thread affinity can be queried using thread() and changed using moveToThread().

By default, a QQuickWindow renders using an accelerated 3D graphics API, such as OpenGL or Vulkan. See Scene Graph Adaptations for a detailed overview of scene graph backends and the supported graphics APIs.

By default, a Transition's animations are applied for any state change in the parent item. The Transition from and to values can be set to restrict the animations to only be applied when changing from one particular state to another.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，过渡项的动画将应用于父项中的任何状态更改。可以设置从和到值的过渡，以限制动画仅在从一种特定状态更改为另一种状态时应用。

trans-unit.source: By default, a history state is shallow, meaning that it will not remember nested states. This can be configured through the historyType property.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，历史状态为浅状态，这意味着它不会记住嵌套状态。可以通过historyType属性进行配置。

trans-unit.source: By default, a normal check delegate cycles between Qt.Unchecked and Qt.Checked states, and a tri-state check delegate cycles between Qt.Unchecked, Qt.PartiallyChecked, and Qt.Checked states.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，正常检查委托在 Qt.Unchecked 和 Qt.Checked 状态之间循环，而三态检查委托在 Qt.Unchecked ， Qt.PartiallyChecked 和 Qt.Checked 状态之间循环。

trans-unit.source: By default, a normal checkbox cycles between Qt.Unchecked and Qt.Checked states, and a tri-state checkbox cycles between Qt.Unchecked, Qt.PartiallyChecked, and Qt.Checked states.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，普通复选框在 Qt.Unchecked 和 Qt.Checked 状态之间循环，三态复选框在 Qt.Unchecked ， Qt.PartiallyChecked 和 Qt.Checked 状态之间循环。

trans-unit.source: By default, a platform-native file dialog will be used if the platform has one. In that case, the widgets which would otherwise be used to construct the dialog will not be instantiated, so related accessors such as layout() and itemDelegate() will return null. You can set the DontUseNativeDialog option to ensure that the widget-based implementation will be used instead of the native dialog.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果平台有本地对话框，则将使用平台本地文件对话框。在那种情况下，将不会实例化将用于构造对话框的小部件，因此相关的访问器（例如layout（）和itemDelegate（））将返回null。您可以设置DontUseNativeDialog选项，以确保将使用基于窗口小部件的实现而不是本机对话框。

trans-unit.source: By default, a point light intensity diminishes according to inverse-square-law. However, the fade-off (and range) can be controlled with the constantFade, linearFade, and quadraticFade properties.

By default, a point light intensity diminishes according to inverse-square-law. However, the fade-off (and range) can be controlled with the constantFade, linearFade, and quadraticFade properties. Light attenuation is calculated using the formula: constantFade + distance * (linearFade * 0.01) + distance * (quadraticFade * 0.0001)^2
By default, a port is chosen automatically.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,会自动选择一个端口。

trans-unit.source: By default, a swap interval of 1 is requested. This variable enables synchronizing to the display's vertical refresh. Use this variable to override the swap interval's value. For instance, passing 0 disables blocking on swap, resulting in running as fast as possible without any synchronization.

By default, all columns in a tree view are movable except the first. To disable movement of these columns, use QHeaderView's setSectionsMovable() function. For more information about rearranging sections, see Moving Header Sections.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，树状视图中的所有列（第一列除外）都是可移动的。要禁用这些列的移动，请使用QHeaderView的setSectionsMovable（）函数。有关重新排列节的更多信息，请参见移动页眉节。

trans-unit.source: By default, all fonts are listed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,所有字体都被列出。

trans-unit.source: By default, all geometry is rendered one on-screen pixel at a time. As you can see on the left in the image below, this leaves harsh edges that may be easily noticeable in high-contrast cases (most noticeably in this black-and-white case).

By default, all mouse buttons are accepted. If an item accepts a mouse button, it will become the mouse grabber item when a mouse press event is delivered for that button. However, if the item does not accept the mouse button, QGraphicsScene will forward the mouse events to the first item beneath it that does.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，接受所有鼠标按钮。如果某个项目接受鼠标按钮，则在为该按钮传递鼠标按下事件时，它将成为鼠标抓取器项目。但是，如果该项目不接受鼠标按钮，则QGraphicsScene会将鼠标事件转发到它下面的第一个项目。

trans-unit.source: By default, all options are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,所有选项都被禁用。

trans-unit.source: By default, all screens reported by the DRM layer are treated as one big virtual desktop. The mouse cursor implementation takes this into account and moves across the screens as expected. Although not recommended, you can disable the virtual desktop by setting separateScreens to false in the configuration.

By default, all sibling items are stacked by insertion order (i.e., the first item you add is drawn before the next item you add). If two items' Z values are different, then the item with the highest Z value is drawn on top. When the Z values are the same, the insertion order will decide the stacking order.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,所有的兄弟项都是按插入顺序堆叠的(即,您添加的第一个项会在您添加的下一个项之前绘制)。如果两个项目的Z值不同,那么Z值最高的项目会被画在上面。当Z值相同时,插入顺序将决定堆叠顺序。

trans-unit.source: By default, all touch points within the touch area are handled.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,触摸区域内的所有触摸点都会被处理。

trans-unit.source: By default, all widgets can be as large or as small as the user wishes, between the minimumSizeHint() (or minimumSize()) and maximumSize() of the widgets.

trans-unit.source: By default, items are enabled, editable, selectable, checkable, and can be used both as the source of a drag and drop operation and as a drop target. Each item's flags can be changed by calling setFlags() with the appropriate value (see Qt::ItemFlags). Checkable items can be checked and unchecked with the setCheckState() function. The corresponding checkState() function indicates whether the item is currently checked.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，项目是启用的，可编辑的，可选择的，可检查的，并且既可以用作拖放操作的源，也可以用作放置目标。可以通过调用具有适当值的setFlags（）来更改每个项目的标志（请参见Qt :: ItemFlags）。可以使用setCheckState（）函数来检查和取消检查可检查项。相应的checkState（）函数指示当前是否检查了该项。

trans-unit.source: By default, links to different pages load within the same WebEngineView object, but web sites may request them to be opened as a new tab, window, or dialog. The newViewRequested() signal is emitted when a request to load the page in a separate web engine view is issued. The NewViewDestination property describes how the new view should be opened. In addition, the WebEngineNewViewRequest utility type can be used to load web pages in separate web engine views.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，指向不同页面的链接会加载到同一WebEngineView对象中，但是网站可能会要求将其打开为新的选项卡，窗口或对话框。所述newViewRequested（）信号被发射时的请求加载该页面在单独的web引擎视图发出。该NewViewDestination属性描述了新的观点应该如何被打开。另外，可以使用WebEngineNewViewRequest实用程序类型在单独的Web引擎视图中加载网页。

trans-unit.source: By default, links to different pages load within the same WebEngineView object, but web sites may request them to be opened as a new tab, window, or dialog. The newViewRequested() signal is emitted when a request to load the page in a separate web engine view is issued. The NewViewDestination property describes how the new view should be opened. In addition, the WebEngineNewViewRequest utility type can be used to load web pages in separate web engine views.

By default, locally available images are loaded immediately, and the user interface is blocked until loading is complete. If a large image is to be loaded, it may be preferable to load the image in a low priority thread, by enabling the asynchronous property.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，本地可用的图像会立即加载，并且用户界面将被阻止，直到加载完成。如果要加载大图像，则最好通过启用异步属性将图像加载到低优先级线程中。

trans-unit.source: By default, methods and property returning subobjects will use the type as in the type library. The caller of the function is responsible for deleting or reparenting the object returned. If the -compat switch is set, properties and method returning a COM object have the return type IDispatch*, and the namespace will not declare wrapper classes for interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，返回方法和属性的子对象将使用类型库中的类型。函数的调用者负责删除或重设返回的对象。如果设置了 -compat 开关，则返回COM对象的属性和方法的返回类型为 IDispatch* ，并且命名空间不会为接口声明包装器类。

By default, properties will have getters and a "push" slot defined, as well as a notify signal emitted when the value is changed. Qt Remote Objects requires the notify signal on the Source object to trigger sending updates to the attached Replicas. In earlier versions of QtRO, properties defaulted to being read/write, that is, having getters and setters. However, due to the asynchronous nature of QtRO, this led to unintuitive behavior at times. Setting the READWRITE attribute on the PROP will provide the old (getter and setter) behavior.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,属性会定义有getter和一个 "push "槽,以及在值被改变时发出的通知信号。Qt Remote Objects需要Source对象上的notify信号来触发向附加的Replicas发送更新。在QtRO的早期版本中,属性默认是读/写的,也就是有getter和setter。然而,由于QtRO的异步性质,这有时会导致不直观的行为。在PROP上设置READWRITE属性将提供旧的(getter和setter)行为。

trans-unit.source: By default, qdoc looks for //! as a code snippet marker. For .pro, .py, .cmake, and CMakeLists.txt files, #! is detected. Finally, <!-- is accepted in .html, .qrc, .ui, .xml, .dita, and .xq files.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，qdoc查找 //! 作为代码段标记。对于 .pro ， .py ， .cmake 和 CMakeLists.txt 文件，请使用 #! 被检测到。最后， <!-- 在 .html ， .qrc ， .ui ， .xml ， .dita 和 .xq 文件中被接受。

trans-unit.source: By default, the 3D scene will first be rendered into an off-screen buffer and then composited with the rest of the Qt Quick scene when it is done. This provides the maximum level of compatibility, but may have performance implications on some graphics hardware. If this is the case, the renderMode property can be used to switch how the View3D is rendered into the window.
By default, the SubWindowView is used to display sub-windows.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，SubWindowView用于显示子窗口。

trans-unit.source: By default, the ShaderEffect consists of four vertices, one for each corner. For non-linear vertex transformations, like page curl, you can specify a fine grid of vertices by specifying a mesh resolution.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ShaderEffect由四个顶点组成，每个顶点一个。对于非线性顶点转换，例如页面卷曲，可以通过指定网格分辨率来指定顶点的精细网格。

trans-unit.source: By default, the depthTestEnabled property is true. This is the normal mode of operation, and rendering is done in two passes. First, reading and writing from the depth buffer is enabled and all opaque objects are rendered from front to back (objects closer to camera are rendered first). In the second pass, writing to the depth buffer is disabled and all transparent (non-opaque) objects are rendered from back to front.
By default, the QPainter operates on the associated device's own coordinate system, but it also has complete support for affine coordinate transformations.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，QPainter在关联设备自己的坐标系上运行，但它也完全支持仿射坐标变换。

trans-unit.source: By default, the Qt::DisplayRole associated with the QModelIndexes is used for comparisons. This can be changed by setting the sortRole property.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，与QModelIndex关联的Qt :: DisplayRole用于比较。可以通过设置sortRole属性来更改。

trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，“ Detail 模式用于显示有关文件和目录的信息。

trans-unit.source: By default, the D3D12 adaptation uses a single-threaded render loop similar to OpenGL's windows render loop. A threaded variant is also available, that you can request by setting the QSG_RENDER_LOOP environment variable to threaded. However, due to conceptual limitations in DXGI, the windowing system interface, the threaded loop is prone to deadlocks when multiple QQuickWindow or QQuickView instances are shown. Consequently, for the time being, the default is the single-threaded loop. This means that with the D3D12 backend, applications are expected to move their work from the main (GUI) thread out to worker threads, instead of expecting Qt to keep the GUI thread responsive and suitable for heavy, blocking operations.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，D3D12改编使用类似于OpenGL的 windows 渲染循环的单线程渲染循环。带螺纹的变型也可以，你可以通过设置要求 QSG_RENDER_LOOP 环境变量 threaded 。但是，由于DXGI，窗口系统接口的概念限制，当多个QQuickWindow或QQuickView时，线程循环易于死锁显示实例。因此，暂时默认为单线程循环。这意味着使用D3D12后端，应用程序应将其工作从主（GUI）线程移至工作线程，而不是期望Qt保持GUI线程响应能力并适用于繁重的阻塞操作。

By default, the Global Object contains the built-in objects that are part of ECMA-262, such as Math, Date and String. Non-local variables in script code will be created as properties of the Global Object, as well as local variables in global code.

trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在Windows上使用Microsoft库。如果要强制使用Sybase Open Client中，你必须定义 Q_USE_SYBASE 在 %QTDIR%\qtbase\src\plugins\sqldrivers\tds\qsql_tds.cpp 。

trans-unit.source: By default, the OpenStreetMap plugin retrieves the provider's information from a remote repository to avoid a loss of service due to unavailability of hardcoded services. The plugin, however, still contains fallback hardcoded provider data, in case the provider repository becomes unreachable. Setting this parameter to true makes the plugin use the hardcoded urls only and therefore prevents the plugin from fetching provider data from the remote repository.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，OpenStreetMap插件从远程存储库中检索提供者的信息，以避免由于硬编码服务的不可用而导致服务丢失。但是，在提供者存储库无法访问的情况下，该插件仍包含回退的硬编码提供者数据。将此参数设置为true可使插件仅使用硬编码的url，因此可以防止插件从远程存储库获取提供者数据。

By default, the engine supports a number of Qt C++ types and can automatically convert them as appropriately when used from QML. trans-unit.source: By default, the handshake phase can choose any of the ciphers supported by this system's SSL libraries, which may vary from system to system. You can revert to using the entire set by calling setCiphers() with the list returned by supportedCiphers().

By default, the handshake phase can choose any of the ciphers supported by this system's SSL libraries, which may vary from system to system. The list of ciphers supported by this system's SSL libraries is returned by QSslSocket::supportedCiphers(). You can restrict the list of ciphers used for choosing the session cipher for this socket by calling setCiphers() with a subset of the supported ciphers. You can revert to using the entire set by calling setCiphers() with the list returned by QSslSocket::supportedCiphers().
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，握手阶段可以选择此系统的SSL库支持的任何密码，具体情况因系统而异。该系统的SSL库支持的密码列表由QSslSocket :: supportedCiphers（）返回。您可以通过调用带有支持密码子集的setCiphers（）来限制用于为此套接字选择会话密码的密码列表。通过调用setCiphers（）和QSslSocket :: supportedCiphers（）返回的列表，可以恢复使用整个集合。

trans-unit.source: By default, the renderer will upload data into the VBO using GL_STATIC_DRAW. Changing this value is mostly useful for platform vendors.

trans-unit.source: By default, the text edit wraps words at whitespace to fit within the text edit widget. The setLineWrapMode() function is used to specify the kind of line wrap you want, WidgetWidth or NoWrap if you don't want any wrapping. If you use word wrap to the widget's width WidgetWidth, you can specify whether to break on whitespace or anywhere with setWordWrapMode().
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，文本编辑将单词包装在空白处以适合文本编辑小部件。该setLineWrapMode（）函数用于指定那种你想换行，的WidgetWidth或NoWrap的，如果你不希望有任何的包装。如果使用自动换行到窗口小部件的宽度WidgetWidth，则可以使用setWordWrapMode（）指定是在空白还是在任何地方断开。

trans-unit.source: By default, the type of a role is fixed the first time the role is used. For example, if you create a role called "data" and assign a number to it, you can no longer assign a string to the "data" role. However, when the dynamicRoles property is enabled, the type of a given role is not fixed and can be different between elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,角色的类型在第一次使用该角色时是固定的。例如,如果你创建了一个名为 "data "的角色,并给它分配了一个数字,你就不能再给 "data "角色分配一个字符串。但是,当启用 dynamicRoles 属性时,给定角色的类型不是固定的,可以在不同元素之间有所不同。

trans-unit.source: By default, the upper-left corner of the target (its 0,0 point) will be anchored to (or follow) the path. The anchorPoint property can be used to specify a different point for anchoring. For example, specifying an anchorPoint of 5,5 for a 10x10 item means the center of the item will follow the path.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,目标的左上角(其 0,0 点)将被锚定到(或跟随)路径。anchorPoint 属性可用于指定不同的锚定点。例如,为一个 10x10 的项目指定一个 5,5 的 anchorPoint,意味着项目的中心将遵循路径。

trans-unit.source: By default, the value is 0, in which case Qt will guess a reasonable default depth based on the size, location and number of items in the scene. If these parameters change frequently, however, you may experience slowdowns as QGraphicsScene retunes the depth internally. You can avoid potential slowdowns by fixating the tree depth through setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，该值为0，在这种情况下，Qt将根据场景中项目的大小，位置和数量来猜测合理的默认深度。但是，如果这些参数经常更改，则QGraphicsScene会在内部重新调整深度时，您可能会遇到速度变慢的情况。您可以通过设置此属性来固定树的深度，从而避免潜在的速度下降。

trans-unit.source: By default, the value is false.

trans-unit.source: By default, the window is not visible, and you must call setVisible(true), or show() or similar to make it visible. To make a window hidden again, call setVisible(false) or hide(). The visible property describes the state the application wants the window to be in. Depending on the underlying system, a visible window might still not be shown on the screen. It could, for instance, be covered by other opaque windows or moved outside the physical area of the screen. On windowing systems that have exposure notifications, the isExposed() accessor describes whether the window should be treated as directly visible on screen. The exposeEvent() function is called whenever an area of the window is invalidated, for example due to the exposure in the windowing system changing. On windowing systems that do not make this information visible to the application, isExposed() will simply return the same value as isVisible().
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，该窗口不可见，您必须调用setVisible（true）或show（）或类似方法使其可见。要再次隐藏窗口，请调用setVisible（false）或hide（）。 visible属性描述应用程序希望窗口进入的状态。根据基础系统，可见窗口可能仍未显示在屏幕上。例如，它可能被其他不透明的窗口覆盖或移到屏幕的物理区域之外。在具有曝光通知的窗口系统上，isExposed（）访问器描述是否应将窗口视为在屏幕上直接可见。该exposeEvent每当窗口的某个区域无效时（例如，由于窗口系统中的曝光度发生变化），都会调用（）函数。在不使该信息对应用程序可见的窗口系统上，isExposed（）将仅返回与isVisible（）相同的值。

trans-unit.source: By default, this function performs no transformation on the values in the QCborValue, writing all floating point directly as double-precision (double) types. That includes infinities and NaN values.
